sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable react-hooks/exhaustive-deps */ import React, {useContext, useEffect, useState} from 'react' import AuthContext from '../../context/autenticacion/AuthContext' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import service from '../../config/axios' import { useHistory } from 'react-router'; export default function Proyectos(props) { // Extraer la info de autenticación const authContext = useContext(AuthContext) const { usuario, usuarioAutenticado, editarUsuario, eliminarUsuario } = authContext const [form, setForm] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { usuarioAutenticado() }, []) const [usuarios, guardarUsuario] = useState({ name: "", email: "", password: "", address:"", mobile:"", confirmar: "" }) console.log(usuarios) const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() // pasarlo al action editarUsuario({ name: form.name, email, password, address, mobile }) } const { name, email, password, address, mobile, confirmar } = usuarios const onChange = (e) => { guardarUsuario({ ...usuarios, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } if(!usuario) return null; return ( <>

This is Your profile

Name: {usuario.name}

Email: {usuario.email}

Address: {usuario.address}

Mobile: {usuario.mobile}

Check

View Your Cart
View Store
{/* Delete Profile */}

EDIT YOUR PROFILE

By signing up, you agree to our Terms, Data Policy and Cookies Policy.

) }
